column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I swear to you though
column2: I've never had sangria this weak.  The multiple times I've been there
column3: we've gotten all different kinds of pitchers white
column5: and I always find myself thinking that I may as well be drinking Mondo.  You remember Mondo - back in the lunch box days.  Yes
column9: just don't waste your money on the sangria.
